Title: As soon as the rocket speads its wings, cows and horses run for a hundred years!
Designer: Chen Yifu (陈贻福)Duan Quanyuan (段全元)
Publisher: Hubei renmin chubanshe (湖北人民出版社)
Notes: The poster is printed on the reverse of educational material for English lessons.
Theme: Great Leap Forward (1958-1961)Foreign imperialistsChinese Space Program
